entry.name: jqmHijackable
entry.title: jqmHijackable()
entry.desc: For users that wish to respect data-ajax=false parent elements during custom form and link binding jQuery Mobile provides the $.fn.jqmHijackable filter method.

longdesc.p: For users that wish to respect data-ajax=false parent elements during custom form and link binding jQuery Mobile provides the $.fn.jqmHijackable filter method.

dl.dd: If, and only if, $.mobile.ignoreContentEnabled is set to true, this method will traverse the parent nodes for each DOM element in the jQuery object and where it finds a data-ajax=false parent, the child form or link will be removed from the set.

dd.div: The operation of traversing all parent elements can be expensive for even small jQuery object sets.
